actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.
Executive Comment Requested from OMB, GSA.
Referred to Subcommittee on Government Activities and Transportation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Government Activities and Transportation

official_title: A bill to authorize the Administrator of the General Services Administration to transfer certain property interests to Raleigh County, West Virginia.

summary.text: Directs certain Federal departments to transfer jurisdiction over specified subsurface property to the Administrator of the General Services Administration. Requires such Administrator to transfer such property without compensation to Raleigh County, West Virginia.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Administrator of the General Services Administration to transfer certain property interests to Raleigh County, West Virginia.
